name: Project Rhythm
description:
Are you ready for a Rhythm game with a wonderful landscape? A game with precise rhythm and a heroic battle? Then, Project Rhythm is for you.

Features:-

1. A game with precise rhythm

2. A game with wonderful Pixel Landscape and Flowers

3. A game with the wonderful taste in Music

Control:-

1. Press Z and V for Big Red Flowers

2.Press X and C for Big Blue Flowers

3.Press X for Red Flower

4.Press C for Blue Flower

Upcoming Features:

1.Primary Setting to control Beats Per Meter,  Offset Speed, Note Size, Right to left/Left to right positioning

2. An Modding Feature

3.Custom Beat mapping

Release Date:- 31st July 2021

Common Bug in operation:-

1. The Resolution in some devices might look wonky. It is under development for fix.

Note:-

This game is in Early Access, which means it is still under development. If any bug, feature request, or for legal purposes you are requested to contact us through our Email:- chakravortyarunabh133@gmail.com
